about_the_game:
He's trying to stay warm for the winter... and looking stylish whilst doing so!

Travel through your Squares Rage levels with a sick beard! Only with Facial Hair Frank.

Purchasing this DLC unlocks the associated character from the parent game, Squares Rage.
detailed_description:
He's trying to stay warm for the winter... and looking stylish whilst doing so!

Travel through your Squares Rage levels with a sick beard! Only with Facial Hair Frank.

Purchasing this DLC unlocks the associated character from the parent game, Squares Rage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/XP(?) (Don't use XP... who still uses that?!)
  • Processor: Pretty much any processor will do.
  • Graphics: Nothing fancy. Be able to at least handle pixel-art/8-bit style graphics.
  • Sound Card: Pretty much any.

short_description: Travel through your Squares Rage levels with a sick beard! Only with Facial Hair Frank.
